rule AnyFile_Regsvr32_Wide
{
    meta:
        author = "Nathan Fowler/Nilanjana Saha"
        date = "2021-05-17"
        last_modified = "2022-07-04"
        description = "Regsvr32 expressed as a 0x00 separated wide or unusual expression of regsvr32 (last 3 strings); possible malicious content."
	reference = "/wiki/ursnif"
    strings:
        $ = "regsvr32"    nocase wide
        $ = "%r1%vr32"
        $ = "%r1%r32"
        $ = "%r1%32"
    condition:
        any of them
}




rule AnyFile_Reverse_ScriptLanguage
{
	meta:
		author = "Nathan Fowler"
		date = "2021-01-29"
		description = "An ascii reversal of '<script language=' or a base64 encoding of 'ActiveXObject' which is an extreme indicator of potential obfuscation for the intent of malicious behavior"
		reference = "/wiki/icedid"
	strings:
		$ = "=egaugnal tpircs<"	nocase ascii

		$ = "RpdmVYT2J" ascii wide // ActiveXObject
		$ = "N0aXZlWE9" ascii wide // ActiveXObject
		$ = "dGl2ZVhPYmp" ascii wide // ActiveXObject
		$ = "N0aXZlWE9iam" ascii wide // ActiveXObject
		$ = "3RpdmVYT2JqZW" ascii wide // ActiveXObject
		$ = "dGl2ZVhPYmplY3" ascii wide // ActiveXObject
		$ = "BjAHQAaQB2AGUAWABPAGIAagB" ascii wide // Null-spaced wide format of ActiveXObject
		$ = "MAdABpAHYAZQBYAE8AYgBqAGU" ascii wide // Null-spaced wide format of ActiveXObject
		$ = "YwB0AGkAdgBlAFgATwBiAGoAZQB" ascii wide // Null-spaced wide format of ActiveXObject
		$ = "BjAHQAaQB2AGUAWABPAGIAagBlAG" ascii wide // Null-spaced wide format of ActiveXObject
		$ = "GMAdABpAHYAZQBYAE8AYgBqAGUAYw" ascii wide // Null-spaced wide format of ActiveXObject
		$ = "YwB0AGkAdgBlAFgATwBiAGoAZQBjAH" ascii wide // Null-spaced wide format of ActiveXObject
		$ = "BjAGUAagBiAE8AWABlAHYAaQB" ascii wide // Reversed Null-spaced wide format of ActiveXObject
		$ = "MAZQBqAGIATwBYAGUAdgBpAHQ" ascii wide // Reversed Null-spaced wide format of ActiveXObject
		$ = "YwBlAGoAYgBPAFgAZQB2AGkAdAB" ascii wide // Reversed Null-spaced wide format of ActiveXObject
		$ = "BjAGUAagBiAE8AWABlAHYAaQB0AG" ascii wide // Reversed Null-spaced wide format of ActiveXObject
		$ = "GMAZQBqAGIATwBYAGUAdgBpAHQAYw" ascii wide // Reversed Null-spaced wide format of ActiveXObject
		$ = "YwBlAGoAYgBPAFgAZQB2AGkAdABjAE" ascii wide // Reversed Null-spaced wide format of ActiveXObject
		$ = "NlamJPWGV" ascii wide // tcejbOXevitcA
		$ = "VqYk9YZXZ" ascii wide // tcejbOXevitcA
		$ = "ZWpiT1hldml" ascii wide // tcejbOXevitcA
		$ = "NlamJPWGV2aX" ascii wide // tcejbOXevitcA
		$ = "2VqYk9YZXZpdG" ascii wide // tcejbOXevitcA
		$ = "ZWpiT1hldml0Y0" ascii wide // tcejbOXevitcA
		// hex encoded string - format present in embedded RTF objects
		$ = "416374697665584f626a656374" ascii wide nocase // ActiveXObject
		// string reversed hex encoded string - format present in embedded RTF objects
		$ = "7463656a624f58657669746341" ascii wide nocase // tcejbOXevitcA
		// reversed string - frequently used obfuscation to evade tight static signatures
		$ = "tcejbOXevitcA" ascii wide nocase // tcejbOXevitcA
	condition:
		any of them
}


rule HexAscii_Bad_Functions
{
	meta:
		author = "Nathan Fowler"
		date = "2020-11-05"
		description = "Malicious functions that have been encoded as hex-ascii inside of a document for the intent of obfuscation and hiding"
		reference = "/wiki/agenttesla"

	strings:
		$ = "4e65742e576562436c69656e74"	nocase ascii	//Net.WebClient; PowerShell
		$ = "225662736372697074"		nocase ascii	//"Vbscript"
		$ = "45786563757465476c6f62616c28"	nocase ascii	//ExecuteGlobal(
		$ = "43003a005c00660061006b006500"	nocase ascii	//C:\fake WIDE

	condition:
		(
			   uint16(0) == 0x5c7b          //rtf
			or uint32(0) == 0x6d783f3c      //xml
			or uint16(0) == 0x0a0d          //asc
			or uint16(0) == 0x0a0a          //asc
			or uint16(0) == 0x2020          //asc
			or uint16(0) == 0x0909          //asc
			or uint16(0) == 0x213c          //html
			or uint16(0) == 0xcfd0          //office
		)
		and any of them
}


rule Powershell_DownloadFile
{
        meta:
                description = "Hidden Powershell download command, suspected StupidAmateurLocker"
                author = "Nathan Fowler"
                risk = "high"
                date = "2016-06-21"
		modified = "2020-10-29"

        strings:

                $ps1 = "powershell"			nocase wide ascii
                $ps2 = "-ExecutionPolicy"		nocase wide ascii
                $ps3 = "-windowstyle"			nocase wide ascii

                $web1 = "System.Net.WebClient"		nocase wide ascii
                $web2 = "DownloadFile"			nocase wide ascii
                $web3 = "://"				wide ascii //You thought I'd put a nocase here didn't you? LOL

        condition:
                all of ($ps*) and any of ($web*)
}

rule Kernel32_Skipping_n_Tripping
{
        meta:
		author = "Nathan Fowler"
                date = "2020-10-16"
                description = "Potential Qakbot maldoc using Kernel32 instancing"
                reference = "/wiki/qakbot"
        strings:
                //0000100: 0200 0000 0800 0000 4b00 6500 7200 6e00  ........K.e.r.n.
                //0000110: 6500 6c00 3300 3200 0000 3000 0000 1701  e.l.3.2...0.....
                //0000120: 004b 0017 0100 6500 0817 0100 7200 0817  .K....e.....r...
                //0000130: 0100 6e00 0817 0100 6500 0817 0100 6c00  ..n.....e.....l.
                //0000140: 0817 0100 3300 0817 0100 3200 0815 0000  ....3.....2.....
                $ = "Kernel32" nocase ascii wide
                $ = { 4b[2-8] 65[2-8] 72[2-8] 6e[2-8] 65[2-8] 6c[2-8] 33[2-8] 32 }
        condition:
                all of them
}

rule Anyfile_DoubleEncoded_MZ
{
	meta:
		author = "Nathan Fowler"

		description = "Double-base64 encoded MZ, likely extremely malicious and intentionally obfuscated"

	strings:

		$ = "VFZxUU"		ascii wide
	condition:

}

    // UTF8 and UTF16-LE string base64 encoded
    $encstring_1 = "hUUBXI0UkUiVUXlkmVSpJKE8" ascii wide // !Q@W#E$R%T^Y&U*I(O)P
    $encstring_2 = "FRQFcjRSRSJVReWSZVKkkoTyl" ascii wide // !Q@W#E$R%T^Y&U*I(O)P
    $encstring_3 = "IVFAVyNFJFIlVF5ZJlUqSShPKVB" ascii wide // !Q@W#E$R%T^Y&U*I(O)P
    $encstring_4 = "ACEAUQBAAFcAIwBFACQAUgAlAFQAXgBZACYAVQAqAEkAKABPACkA" ascii wide // !Q@W#E$R%T^Y&U*I(O)P
    $encstring_5 = "IQBRAEAAVwAjAEUAJABSACUAVABeAFkAJgBVACoASQAoAE8AKQBQ" ascii wide // !Q@W#E$R%T^Y&U*I(O)P
    $encstring_6 = "AhAFEAQABXACMARQAkAFIAJQBUAF4AWQAmAFUAKgBJACgATwApAFAA" ascii wide // !Q@W#E$R%T^Y&U*I(O)P
    // string reversed UTF8 and UTF16-LE string base64 encoded
    $encstring_7 = "QKU8oSSpVJlleVCVSJEUjV0B" ascii wide // P)O(I*U&Y^T%R$E#W@Q!
    $encstring_8 = "ApTyhJKlUmWV5UJVIkRSNXQFE" ascii wide // P)O(I*U&Y^T%R$E#W@Q!
    $encstring_9 = "UClPKEkqVSZZXlQlUiRFI1dAUSF" ascii wide // P)O(I*U&Y^T%R$E#W@Q!
    $encstring_10 = "AFAAKQBPACgASQAqAFUAJgBZAF4AVAAlAFIAJABFACMAVwBAAFEA" ascii wide // P)O(I*U&Y^T%R$E#W@Q!
    $encstring_11 = "UAApAE8AKABJACoAVQAmAFkAXgBUACUAUgAkAEUAIwBXAEAAUQAh" ascii wide // P)O(I*U&Y^T%R$E#W@Q!
    $encstring_12 = "BQACkATwAoAEkAKgBVACYAWQBeAFQAJQBSACQARQAjAFcAQABRACEA" ascii wide // P)O(I*U&Y^T%R$E#W@Q!
    // hex encoded string - format present in embedded RTF objects
    $encstring_13 = "215140572345245225545e5926552a49284f2950" ascii wide nocase // !Q@W#E$R%T^Y&U*I(O)P
    // string reversed hex encoded string - format present in embedded RTF objects
    $encstring_14 = "50294f28492a5526595e54255224452357405121" ascii wide nocase // P)O(I*U&Y^T%R$E#W@Q!
    // base64 encoded, then hex encoded
    $encstring_15 = "68555542584930556b55695655586c6b6d5653704a4b4538" ascii wide nocase // hUUBXI0UkUiVUXlkmVSpJKE8
    $encstring_16 = "46525146636a525352534a56526557535a564b6b6b6f54796c" ascii wide nocase // FRQFcjRSRSJVReWSZVKkkoTyl
    $encstring_17 = "4956464156794e464a46496c5646355a4a6c5571535368504b5642" ascii wide nocase // IVFAVyNFJFIlVF5ZJlUqSShPKVB
  condition:
    $strings1 or any of ($encstring_*)
}

rule hostile_vbs_lokibot {
	meta:
		author = "Ryan C. Moon"
		date = "2018-10-01"
		description = "Identifies hostile vbs files used by lokibot malspam"
		weight = 100

	strings:
		// script calls with external resources
		$header = "strLinhaComandoAddRegistro" ascii
		$username_as_file = "=%USERNAME%.vbs" ascii
		$set_nothing = " = Nothing" ascii

	condition:
		$header and $username_as_file and #set_nothing > 3
}
rule retefe_crypt1
{
	meta:
		author = "Jason Reaves"
		sample = "f4081aced73a37fdb4fa589925ac31f86fec83b9aed6b12d3ad06880bb880401"
		strings:
			$decode1 = {8b d? d3 ea 83 c1 08 [0-1] 88 1? [0-1] 4? [0-3] 83 f9 20 72}
			$decode2 = {8b c? [0-3] 83 e0 03 [0-2] 8a 04 1? 30 0? [0-3]  4? 3b}
			$iid = {e1 2a 1a bb f9 a4 cf 11 8f 20 00 80 5f 2c d0 64}
		condition:
			all of them
}

{

		description = "Base64 encoded PowerShell commands used in droppers"

		date = "2017-10-19"

	strings:
		$b1 = "IABOAGUAdwAtAE8AYgBqAGUAYwB0ACAAUwB5AHMAdABlAG0ALgBOAGUAdAAuAFcAZQBiAEMAbABpAGUAbgB0"
		$b2 = "RABvAHcAbgBsAG8AYQBkAEYAaQBsAGUA"
		$b3 = "AFMAdABhAHIAdAAtAFAAcgBvAGMAZQBzAHMA"

		all of them

rule Office_Powershell
{
        meta:
                description = "Office Document containing Powershell hidden/process injection"
                author = "Nathan Fowler"
                risk = "high"

        strings:
		$ps1 = "powershell.exe" nocase
		$ps2 = "-NoP"
		$ps3 = "-NonI"
		$ps4 = "Hidden"
		$ps5 = "-Enc"

        condition:
                all of ($ps*)
}

rule PowerShell
{
     meta:
         description = "Office document using PowerShell to execute a file hidden with bypass policy"
         author = "Nathan Fowler, Phil Fannin, Ryan Moon, Michelle Ticer, Juan Figuera"
         risk = "high"

     strings:
         $string1 = "powershell" nocase
	 $string2 = /[\x22\x27]powershell/ nocase
	 $string3 = /-ExecutionPolicy[\x20\x09]+Bypass/ nocase
	 $string4 = /-WindowStyle[\x20\x09]+hidden/ nocase

     condition:
         all of them
}

rule URL_Concat
{
     meta:
         description = "Office document using string building/concatenation for URLs"
         author = "Nathan Fowler"
         risk = "high"

     strings:
         $string1 = "'ht'+'tp://'" nocase
         $string2 = "'ht' + 'tp://'" nocase

     condition:
         any of them
}

rule Office_Macro_ActiveMime
{
     meta:
         description = "M$ Office document containing macro with ActiveMime "
         author = "Roberto Martinez"
         risk = "high"

     strings:
         $string1 = "Content-Location: file:///"
         $string2 = "Content-Transfer-Encoding: base64"
         $string3 = "Content-Type: application/x-mso"
         $string4 = "QWN0aXZlTWltZQAA"

     condition:
         all of them
}
